CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 23, 1946, pg. 12 reads: "Sworn In - Walter Rainey (right) was sworn in as County Detective by Judge John P. Eagan in his chamber last Friday. Mr. Rainey went on active duty immediately.  He has been active in civic and political circles in Pittsburgh.-Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Judge John P. Eagan wearing robe, swearing in Walter Rainey as County Detective
